30#ifdef _WIN32
31#include <netinet/sctp_pcb.h>
32#include <sys/timeb.h>
33#include <iphlpapi.h>
34#if !defined(__MINGW32__)
35#pragma comment(lib, "iphlpapi.lib")
36#endif
37#endif
38#include <netinet/sctp_os_userspace.h>
39#if defined(__FreeBSD__)
40#include <pthread_np.h>
41#endif
42
43#if defined(__linux__)
44#include <sys/prctl.h>
45#endif
46
47#if defined(_WIN32)
48/* Adapter to translate Unix thread start routines to Windows thread start
49 * routines.
50 */
51#if defined(__MINGW32__)
52#pragma GCC diagnostic push
53#pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Wpedantic"
54#endif
55static DWORD WINAPI
56sctp_create_thread_adapter(void *arg) {
57 start_routine_t start_routine = (start_routine_t)arg;
58 return start_routine(NULL) == NULL;
59}
60
61int
62sctp_userspace_thread_create(userland_thread_t *thread, start_routine_t start_routine)
63{
64 *thread = CreateThread(NULL, 0, sctp_create_thread_adapter,
65 (void *)start_routine, 0, NULL);
66 if (*thread == NULL)
67 return GetLastError();
68 return 0;
69}
70
71#if defined(__MINGW32__)
72#pragma GCC diagnostic pop
73#endif
74
75#else
76int
77sctp_userspace_thread_create(userland_thread_t *thread, start_routine_t start_routine)
78{
79 return pthread_create(thread, NULL, start_routine, NULL);
80}
81#endif
82
83void
84sctp_userspace_set_threadname(const char *name)
85{
86#if defined(__APPLE__)
87 pthread_setname_np(name);
88#endif
89#if defined(__linux__)
90 prctl(PR_SET_NAME, name);
91#endif
92#if defined(__FreeBSD__)
93 pthread_set_name_np(pthread_self(), name);
94#endif
95}
96
97#if !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__native_client__)
98int
99sctp_userspace_get_mtu_from_ifn(uint32_t if_index, int af)
100{
101#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
102 struct ifreq ifr;
103 int fd;
104#endif
105 int mtu;
106
107 switch (af) {
108#if defined(INET)
109 case AF_INET:
110#endif
111#if defined(INET6)
112 case AF_INET6:
113#endif
114#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
115 memset(&ifr, 0, sizeof(struct ifreq));
116 mtu = 0;
117 if (if_indextoname(if_index, ifr.ifr_name) != NULL) {
118 /* TODO can I use the raw socket here and not have to open a new one with each query? */
119 if ((fd = socket(af, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) < 0) {
120 break;
121 }
122 if (ioctl(fd, SIOCGIFMTU, &ifr) >= 0) {
123 mtu = ifr.ifr_mtu;
124 }
125 close(fd);
126 }
127 break;
128#endif
129 case AF_CONN:
130 mtu = 1280;
131 break;
132 default:
133 mtu = 0;
134 break;
135 }
136 return (mtu);
137}
138#endif
139
140#if defined(__native_client__)
141int
142sctp_userspace_get_mtu_from_ifn(uint32_t if_index, int af)
143{
144 return 1280;
145}
146#endif
147
148#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__linux__) || defined(__native_client__) || defined(__NetBSD__) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__Fuchsia__) || defined(__EMSCRIPTEN__)
149int
150timingsafe_bcmp(const void *b1, const void *b2, size_t n)
151{
152 const unsigned char *p1 = b1, *p2 = b2;
153 int ret = 0;
154
155 for (; n > 0; n--)
156 ret |= *p1++ ^ *p2++;
157 return (ret != 0);
158}
159#endif
160
161#ifdef _WIN32
162int
163sctp_userspace_get_mtu_from_ifn(uint32_t if_index, int af)
164{
165#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
166 PIP_ADAPTER_ADDRESSES pAdapterAddrs, pAdapt;
167 DWORD AdapterAddrsSize, Err;
168#endif
169 int mtu;
170
171 switch (af) {
172#if defined(INET)
173 case AF_INET:
174#endif
175#if defined(INET6)
176 case AF_INET6:
177#endif
178#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
179 mtu = 0;
180 AdapterAddrsSize = 0;
181 pAdapterAddrs = NULL;
182 if ((Err = GetAdaptersAddresses(AF_UNSPEC, 0, NULL, NULL, &AdapterAddrsSize)) != 0) {
183 if ((Err != ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW) && (Err != ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER)) {
184 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "GetAdaptersAddresses() sizing failed with error code %d, AdapterAddrsSize = %d\n", Err, AdapterAddrsSize);
185 mtu = -1;
186 goto cleanup;
187 }
188 }
189 if ((pAdapterAddrs = (PIP_ADAPTER_ADDRESSES) GlobalAlloc(GPTR, AdapterAddrsSize)) == NULL) {
190 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Memory allocation error!\n");
191 mtu = -1;
192 goto cleanup;
193 }
194 if ((Err = GetAdaptersAddresses(AF_UNSPEC, 0, NULL, pAdapterAddrs, &AdapterAddrsSize)) != ERROR_SUCCESS) {
195 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "GetAdaptersAddresses() failed with error code %d\n", Err);
196 mtu = -1;
197 goto cleanup;
198 }
199 for (pAdapt = pAdapterAddrs; pAdapt; pAdapt = pAdapt->Next) {
200 if (pAdapt->IfIndex == if_index) {
201 mtu = pAdapt->Mtu;
202 break;
203 }
204 }
205 cleanup:
206 if (pAdapterAddrs != NULL) {
207 GlobalFree(pAdapterAddrs);
208 }
209 break;
210#endif
211 case AF_CONN:
212 mtu = 1280;
213 break;
214 default:
215 mtu = 0;
216 break;
217 }
218 return (mtu);
219}
220
221void
222getwintimeofday(struct timeval *tv)
223{
224 FILETIME filetime;
225 ULARGE_INTEGER ularge;
226
227 GetSystemTimeAsFileTime(&filetime);
228 ularge.LowPart = filetime.dwLowDateTime;
229 ularge.HighPart = filetime.dwHighDateTime;
230 /* Change base from Jan 1 1601 00:00:00 to Jan 1 1970 00:00:00 */
231#if defined(__MINGW32__)
232 ularge.QuadPart -= 116444736000000000ULL;
233#else
234 ularge.QuadPart -= 116444736000000000UI64;
235#endif
236 /*
237 * ularge.QuadPart is now the number of 100-nanosecond intervals
238 * since Jan 1 1970 00:00:00.
239 */
240#if defined(__MINGW32__)
241 tv->tv_sec = (long)(ularge.QuadPart / 10000000ULL);
242 tv->tv_usec = (long)((ularge.QuadPart % 10000000ULL) / 10ULL);
243#else
244 tv->tv_sec = (long)(ularge.QuadPart / 10000000UI64);
245 tv->tv_usec = (long)((ularge.QuadPart % 10000000UI64) / 10UI64);
246#endif
247}
248
249int
250win_if_nametoindex(const char *ifname)
251{
252 IP_ADAPTER_ADDRESSES *addresses, *addr;
253 ULONG status, size;
254 int index = 0;
255
256 if (!ifname) {
257 return 0;
258 }
259
260 size = 0;
261 status = GetAdaptersAddresses(AF_UNSPEC, 0, NULL, NULL, &size);
262 if (status != ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW) {
263 return 0;
264 }
265 addresses = malloc(size);
266 status = GetAdaptersAddresses(AF_UNSPEC, 0, NULL, addresses, &size);
267 if (status == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
268 for (addr = addresses; addr; addr = addr->Next) {
269 if (addr->AdapterName && !strcmp(ifname, addr->AdapterName)) {
270 index = addr->IfIndex;
271 break;
272 }
273 }
274 }
275
276 free(addresses);
277 return index;
278}

392
393void
394InitializeXPConditionVariable(userland_cond_t *cv)
395{
396 cv->waiters_count = 0;
397 InitializeCriticalSection(&(cv->waiters_count_lock));
398 cv->events_[C_SIGNAL] = CreateEvent (NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL);
399 cv->events_[C_BROADCAST] = CreateEvent (NULL, TRUE, FALSE, NULL);
400}
401
402void
403DeleteXPConditionVariable(userland_cond_t *cv)
404{
405 CloseHandle(cv->events_[C_BROADCAST]);
406 CloseHandle(cv->events_[C_SIGNAL]);
407 DeleteCriticalSection(&(cv->waiters_count_lock));
408}
409
410int
411SleepXPConditionVariable(userland_cond_t *cv, userland_mutex_t *mtx)
412{
413 int result, last_waiter;
414
415 EnterCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
416 cv->waiters_count++;
417 LeaveCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
418 LeaveCriticalSection (mtx);
419 result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, cv->events_, FALSE, INFINITE);
420 if (result==-1) {
421 result = GetLastError();
422 }
423 EnterCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
424 cv->waiters_count--;
425 last_waiter = result == (C_SIGNAL + C_BROADCAST && (cv->waiters_count == 0));
426 LeaveCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
427 if (last_waiter)
428 ResetEvent(cv->events_[C_BROADCAST]);
429 EnterCriticalSection (mtx);
430 return result;
431}
432
433void
434WakeAllXPConditionVariable(userland_cond_t *cv)
435{
436 int have_waiters;
437 EnterCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
438 have_waiters = cv->waiters_count > 0;
439 LeaveCriticalSection(&cv->waiters_count_lock);
440 if (have_waiters)
441 SetEvent (cv->events_[C_BROADCAST]);
442}
443#endif
444#endif
